descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center][color=#ffff00][size=5]Blade of Necromancer Reborn v1.0 Eng/Rus[/size][/color][/center][/size]
[center][size=6]***[/size][color=#1e84cc][size=3]
[color=#6fa8dc]First of all, I want to invite you to my Discord modding channel.[/color][/size][/color][/center][size=3][center][color=#6fa8dc]Mod discussion, experience sharing and cozy chat to spend your free time.[/color][/center]
[/size][center][img]https://s1.postimg.org/1jcocbq933/rm_Discord.png[/img][/center]

[size=4][center]Feel free to [url=https://discord.gg/4mrwQQz]JOIN[/url]![/center]
[/size]
[size=6][center]***[/center][/size]
[size=3][color=#ffff00]Authors:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, location

[color=#ffff00]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mods adds new weapon - Blade of Necromancer (and a couple of minor items as well), that can be obtained in a new location - Garomyth Ruins, that is North from Riften. Be prepared to fight a band of necromancers to get this weapon.

[color=#ffff00]Weapon stats:[/color][/size]
[size=3]Type: 1H dagger.
Weight: 6
Damage: base 10, crit. 5
Enchantment: Absorb 15 pts. of Health. Soul trap for 3 sec.
Reach: 0,7
Speed: 1,0
Improvement: 1 Ebony ingot, required perk - Ebony smithing.
[/size]
[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Join me on my [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/RonnieMagnumModsAndOther/]Facebook group[/url] to be updated about my upcoming mods.

On my [url=http://ronnietheblacksmith.deviantart.com/]Deviantart page[/url]...

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]
[center][/center]
author: Ronnie Magnum
